com.knowledgeplayers.grar.display.TweenManager

type
class
Manage the most frequently used tweens

Static Methods

applyTransition(display : nme.display.DisplayObject, ref : String) : com.eclecticdesignstudio.motion.actuators.IGenericActuator

parameters
display : Target of the tween
ref : The name of the fade transition to applied
returns
the actuator
Apply the given transition to the given displayObject

parameters
